analyzed: dngos po med pa yang ma yin / dmigs pa yang ma yin /
translated: It is not a non-thing.🔽It is not an object.

original: mi dmigs pa yang ma yin /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa yang ma yin /
translated: It is not a non-object.

original: 'gro ba yang ma yin /
analyzed: 'gro ba yang ma yin /
translated: They are not going.

original: 'ong ba yang ma yin /🔽song ba yang ma yin /
analyzed: 'ong ba yang ma yin / song ba yang ma yin /
translated: They are not coming.🔽They have not gone.

original: ma song ba yang ma yin /🔽stong pa yang ma yin /
analyzed: ma song ba yang ma yin / stong pa yang ma yin /
translated: They have not not gone.🔽They are not empty.

original: mi stong pa yang ma yin /🔽mtshan ma yod pa yang ma yin /
analyzed: mi stong pa yang ma yin / mtshan ma yod pa yang ma yin /
translated: They are not not empty.🔽They are not with signs.

original: mtshan ma med pa yang ma yin /🔽smon pa yod pa yang ma yin /
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa yang ma yin / smon pa yod pa yang ma yin /
translated: They are not signless.🔽They are not having aspirations.🔽They are not without aspirations.

original: smon pa med pa yang ma yin no //🔽zhes bya bar shes par gyur to //
analyzed: smon pa med pa yang ma yin no // zhes bya bar shes par gyur to //
translated: They are not with or without aspirations.🔽They do not dwell on any phenomena.

original: de dag de ltar chos thams cad la yang mi gnas pa'i yid kyis de dag ming la mi gnas /🔽tha snyad la yang mi gnas /
analyzed: de dag de ltar chos thams cad la yang mi gnas pa'i yid kyis de dag ming la mi gnas / tha snyad la yang mi gnas /
translated: They do not dwell on names.🔽They do not dwell on conventions.

original: brjod pa la yang mi gnas te /🔽de dag ni /🔽brjod pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin /
analyzed: brjod pa la yang mi gnas te / de dag ni / brjod pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin /
translated: They do not dwell on expressions.🔽They do not have the perception of expressions.

original: brjod du med pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin /
analyzed: brjod du med pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin /
translated: They do not have the perception of inexpressibility.

original: bya ba'i 'du shes can yang ma yin /
analyzed: bya ba'i 'du shes can yang ma yin /
translated: They do not have the perception of activity.

original: bya ba med pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin /🔽so so'i skye bo'i 'du shes can yang ma yin /
analyzed: bya ba med pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin / so so'i skye bo'i 'du shes can yang ma yin /
translated: They do not have the perception of inactivity.🔽They do not have the perception of ordinary beings.

original: so so'i skye bo ma yin pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin /
analyzed: so so'i skye bo ma yin pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin /
translated: They do not have the perception of not being ordinary beings.

original: so so'i skye bo'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin /
analyzed: so so'i skye bo'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin /
translated: They do not have the perception of the qualities of ordinary beings.

original: so so'i skye bo ma yin pa'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin /
analyzed: so so'i skye bo ma yin pa'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin /
translated: They do not have the perception of the qualities of those who are not ordinary beings.

original: nyan thos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin /🔽nyan thos @200a *//
analyzed: nyan thos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin / nyan thos @200a *//
translated: They do not have the perception of śrāvakas.

original: ma yin pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin /🔽nyan thos kyi chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin /
analyzed: ma yin pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin / nyan thos kyi chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin /
translated: They do not have the perception of those who are not śrāvakas.🔽They do not have the perception of the qualities of śrāvakas.

original: nyan thos ma yin pa'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin /
analyzed: nyan thos ma yin pa'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin /
translated: They do not have the perception of the qualities of those who are not śrāvakas.

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin /
translated: They do not have the perception of pratyekabuddhas.

original: rang sangs rgyas ma yin pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas ma yin pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin /
translated: They do not have the perception of those who are not pratyekabuddhas.🔽They do not have the perception of the qualities of pratyekabuddhas.

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin; rang sangs rgyas ma yin pa'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin /🔽byang chub sems dpa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin; rang sangs rgyas ma yin pa'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin / byang chub sems dpa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin /
translated: They do not have the perception of the qualities of those who are not pratyekabuddhas.🔽They do not have the perception of bodhisattvas.

original: byang chub sems dpa' ma yin pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' ma yin pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin /
translated: They do not have the perception of those who are not bodhisattvas.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin /
translated: They do not have the perception of the Dharma of the bodhisattvas.

original: byang chub sems dpa' ma yin pa'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' ma yin pa'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin /
translated: They do not have the perception of the Dharma of those who are not bodhisattvas.

original: sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin /
translated: They do not have the perception of the buddhas.

original: sangs rgyas ma yin pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin /
analyzed: sangs rgyas ma yin pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin /
translated: They do not have the perception of those who are not buddhas.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin /
translated: They do not have the perception of the Dharma of the buddhas.

original: sangs rgyas ma yin pa'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin /🔽mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin /
analyzed: sangs rgyas ma yin pa'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin / mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin /
translated: They do not have the perception of the Dharma of those who are not buddhas.🔽They do not have the perception of nirvāṇa.

original: mya ngan las 'das pa ma yin pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin /
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa ma yin pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin /
translated: They do not have the perception of what is not nirvāṇa.

original: 'khor ba'i 'du shes can yang ma yin /
analyzed: 'khor ba'i 'du shes can yang ma yin /
translated: They do not have the perception of saṃsāra.

original: 'khor ba med pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin te /
analyzed: 'khor ba med pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin te /
translated: They do not have the perception of what is not saṃsāra.

original: de ltar thams cad kyi thams cad du rtog pa med pa'i blo can nam mkha' bzhin du dag @200b cing gos pa med par gyur nas de rnams dag pa dang gos pa med pa'i phyir de'i tshe de dag zhi bas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa
analyzed: de ltar thams cad kyi thams cad du rtog pa med pa'i blo can nam mkha' bzhin du dag @200b cing gos pa med par gyur nas de rnams dag pa dang gos pa med pa'i phyir de'i tshe de dag zhi bas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa
translated: Thus, with minds completely free of concepts, like space, pure and unstained, they became completely pure and unstained. Because of their purity and lack of stain, at that time they praised the Blessed One with these verses:

original: dag gis mngon par bstod pa /
analyzed: dag gis mngon par bstod pa /
translated: They praised him with these verses:

original: zhi la zhi ba'i thugs mnga' zhi ba spyad cing zhi ba'i pha rol byon //
analyzed: zhi la zhi ba'i thugs mnga' zhi ba spyad cing zhi ba'i pha rol byon //
translated: “You have a peaceful mind, you practice peace, you have gone beyond peace.

original: zhi ba bsten par mdzad cing 'gro la zhi ba ston pa rjes su ston //
analyzed: zhi ba bsten par mdzad cing 'gro la zhi ba ston pa rjes su ston //
translated: You rely on peace and teach peace to beings.

original: zhi ba'i spyod yul dgyes shing byang chub zhi la dri bral 'khrug ma mchis //
analyzed: zhi ba'i spyod yul dgyes shing byang chub zhi la dri bral 'khrug ma mchis //
translated: You delight in the sphere of peace, and awakening is peaceful, free of stains, and unperturbed.

original: khyod kyis 'chi med zhi ba 'gro rgyud thams cad zad pa myur du brnyes //
analyzed: khyod kyis 'chi med zhi ba 'gro rgyud thams cad zad pa myur du brnyes //
translated: You have quickly attained deathless peace, the exhaustion of all the continuums of beings.

original: zhi ba thob par bgyid pa'i zhi ba'i lam mchog zhi ba yang dag bsten //
analyzed: zhi ba thob par bgyid pa'i zhi ba'i lam mchog zhi ba yang dag bsten //
translated: You have relied on the supreme path of peace, which leads to the attainment of peace.

original: yan lag brgyad pas nyon mongs klong rnams zhi mdzad 'gro ba thams cad bton //
analyzed: yan lag brgyad pas nyon mongs klong rnams zhi mdzad 'gro ba thams cad bton //
translated: You have liberated all beings by pacifying the turbulent states of affliction with the eightfold path.

original: sngon gyi rgyal bas bsten pa'i byang chub gzhal yas zhi ba de la 'god //
analyzed: sngon gyi rgyal bas bsten pa'i byang chub gzhal yas zhi ba de la 'god //
translated: “You will attain the peace of the infinite enlightenment that was followed by the victors of the past.”

original: de ston sangs rgyas 'phags pas bsten pa'i grong khyer zhi bar deng zhes gsung //
analyzed: de ston sangs rgyas 'phags pas bsten pa'i grong khyer zhi bar deng zhes gsung //
translated: “Go to the city of peace that is followed by the noble buddhas who teach that.”

original: 'dren pa de ltar 'gro ba 'di la rgyal bas bsten pa'i bslab pa bstan //
analyzed: 'dren pa de ltar 'gro ba 'di la rgyal bas bsten pa'i bslab pa bstan //
translated: “Guide, the Victor taught the training to this world.

original: gal te bslab pa de slob 'gro ba 'di dag byang chub gzhal yas 'thob //
analyzed: gal te bslab pa de slob 'gro ba 'di dag byang chub gzhal yas 'thob //
translated: If beings train in that training, they will attain the infinite enlightenment.”

original: bslab nas zhi zhing yid zhi zhi ba'i lam dong dbang po zhi ba dag /
analyzed: bslab nas zhi zhing yid zhi zhi ba'i lam dong dbang po zhi ba dag /
translated: “Having trained, they will go on the path of peace, with peaceful minds, peaceful faculties,

original: 'jig rten mkhas pa 'gro ba zhi byed mthu chen zhi ba shes par 'gyur //
analyzed: 'jig rten mkhas pa 'gro ba zhi byed mthu chen zhi ba shes par 'gyur //
translated: and will become wise in the world, pacifiers of beings, great powers, and knowers of peace.”

original: 'dren pa khyod kyi sras mchog zhi ba 'gro ba zhi bgyid gang dag gis //
analyzed: 'dren pa khyod kyi sras mchog zhi ba 'gro ba zhi bgyid gang dag gis //
translated: “Guide, your supreme sons are peaceful, pacifiers of beings,

original: 'chi med zhi ba mtshan ma thams cad zad pa rnam par rtogs gyur pa //
analyzed: 'chi med zhi ba mtshan ma thams cad zad pa rnam par rtogs gyur pa //
translated: who have realized deathless peace, the exhaustion of all signs.

original: de dag 'dren pa tshul la mchod pa'i mchod pa mchog gis mchod par 'gyur //
analyzed: de dag 'dren pa tshul la mchod pa'i mchod pa mchog gis mchod par 'gyur //
translated: They will make offerings to the Guide with the supreme offering of conduct.

original: nyon mongs zhi zhing @201a *//
analyzed: nyon mongs zhi zhing @201a *//
translated: They will be pacified in their afflictions,

original: mtshan ma kun spangs zhi ba rtag tu ston par 'gyur //
analyzed: mtshan ma kun spangs zhi ba rtag tu ston par 'gyur //
translated: Always teaching the peace that is free of all signs.

original: 'gro ba thams cad zhi zhing mtshan ma bral ba de nyid mya ngan 'das //
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad zhi zhing mtshan ma bral ba de nyid mya ngan 'das //
translated: The peace of all beings, free of signs, is nirvana.

original: thub pa gang dag zhi las zhi 'dod sems pa de dag nyon mongs 'gyur //
analyzed: thub pa gang dag zhi las zhi 'dod sems pa de dag nyon mongs 'gyur //
translated: Those who wish for peace, who long for peace, but whose minds are troubled, are deluded.

original: rgyal ba khyod kyi byang chub dang ni 'gro kun chos kun bsam mi khyab //
analyzed: rgyal ba khyod kyi byang chub dang ni 'gro kun chos kun bsam mi khyab //
translated: Your enlightenment, O Victorious One, and all beings and phenomena are inconceivable.

original: thub pa blo ldan 'dam las rgal ba de la bdag cag dogs ma mchis //
analyzed: thub pa blo ldan 'dam las rgal ba de la bdag cag dogs ma mchis //
translated: We have no doubts about the Sage, the wise one who has crossed the swamp.

original: gang dag phung po bor te byang chub zhi tshol de la zhi bar rtogs //
analyzed: gang dag phung po bor te byang chub zhi tshol de la zhi bar rtogs //
translated: Those who seek peaceful enlightenment by abandoning the aggregates understand peace.

original: phung pos 'jigs pa de dag sh'akya thub pa'i bstan la dga' ma lags //
analyzed: phung pos 'jigs pa de dag sh'akya thub pa'i bstan la dga' ma lags //
translated: Those who fear the aggregates do not delight in the teachings of Shakyamuni.

original: dben pa'i blo gros ldan pa zhi tshol de dag blo 'khrugs gyur pa ste //
analyzed: dben pa'i blo gros ldan pa zhi tshol de dag blo 'khrugs gyur pa ste //
translated: Those with the intelligence of solitude, who seek peace, have troubled minds.

original: chos kyi mtshan ma spyod yul 'di dag byis pa zhes ni ston pas gsungs //
analyzed: chos kyi mtshan ma spyod yul 'di dag byis pa zhes ni ston pas gsungs //
translated: The Teacher has said that those who engage with the signs of phenomena are childish.

original: thams cad mkhyen pas zhi dang mtshan ma'i 'ching ba 'di dag rab tu gsungs //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pas zhi dang mtshan ma'i 'ching ba 'di dag rab tu gsungs //
translated: The Omniscient One has taught the peace that is free of the bonds of signs.

original: thub pa gang dag phung po rnams la rnam pa kun tu mtshan mi rnyed //
analyzed: thub pa gang dag phung po rnams la rnam pa kun tu mtshan mi rnyed //
translated: Those who in every way do not find a sign in the aggregates,

original: de dag sh'akya thub pa'i bstan pa mdzes byed gang dag mtshan med dga'//
analyzed: de dag sh'akya thub pa'i bstan pa mdzes byed gang dag mtshan med dga'//
translated: They delight in the signless, the adornment of the teachings of the Sage.

original: de dag byang chub skyon bral zhi ba mkhas pa'i spyod yul thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: de dag byang chub skyon bral zhi ba mkhas pa'i spyod yul thob par 'gyur //
translated: They will attain the state of enlightenment, free from faults, the domain of the wise.

original: bdud kyi rtsod las rgyal nas nyon mongs zhi ba thams cad mkhyen pa thob //
analyzed: bdud kyi rtsod las rgyal nas nyon mongs zhi ba thams cad mkhyen pa thob //
translated: Having conquered the disputes of Māra, they attain omniscience, the pacification of all afflictions.

original: rnam 'dren zhi ba mdzad la bstod pas bdag cag bsod nams gang rnyed pa //
analyzed: rnam 'dren zhi ba mdzad la bstod pas bdag cag bsod nams gang rnyed pa //
translated: Whatever merit we have gained by praising the one who acts peacefully, the guide,

original: chags med thugs mnga' bde bar gshegs pas 'di tsam zhes ni mkhyen gyur pa //
analyzed: chags med thugs mnga' bde bar gshegs pas 'di tsam zhes ni mkhyen gyur pa //
translated: May the Sugata, whose mind is free from attachment, know this much.

original: des ni 'gro ba thams cad lam @201b mchog thams cad mkhyen pas bsten gyur pa //
analyzed: des ni 'gro ba thams cad lam @201b mchog thams cad mkhyen pas bsten gyur pa //
translated: By that, may all beings follow the supreme path taught by the Omniscient One,

original: zhi byed zhi ba bsten nas mkhas pa mchod pa'i rang byung sdig med shog /
analyzed: zhi byed zhi ba bsten nas mkhas pa mchod pa'i rang byung sdig med shog /
translated: And may the wise, having relied on the peaceful one, the self-arisen one free from faults, make offerings.

original: de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas tshangs pa rnams dang lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la bstod par rig nas bdag nyid kyis tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa /
analyzed: de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas tshangs pa rnams dang lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la bstod par rig nas bdag nyid kyis tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa /
translated: Then Brahma, lord of the Sahā world, knowing that the Brahmās and gods were praising the Bhagavān, himself praised the Bhagavān with verses that were in accord with reality:

original: mi dbang khyod kyis chos rnams thams cad ni //🔽log par rmongs byed chang pa stong 'dra zhing //
analyzed: mi dbang khyod kyis chos rnams thams cad ni // log par rmongs byed chang pa stong 'dra zhing //
translated: “You, Lord of Humans, have understood that all phenomena🔽Are like an empty fist or a mirage,

original: ston gyi sprin 'dra mig 'khrul 'dra bar mkhyen //
analyzed: ston gyi sprin 'dra mig 'khrul 'dra bar mkhyen //
translated: Like a cloud in autumn, or an optical illusion.

original: rgyal bas 'dod pa'i yon tan med par mkhyen //
analyzed: rgyal bas 'dod pa'i yon tan med par mkhyen //
translated: The Victorious One has understood that the sense pleasures are nonexistent.

original: ji ltar mi zhig rmi lam bkres gyur pas //
analyzed: ji ltar mi zhig rmi lam bkres gyur pas //
translated: Just as a person who is hungry in a dream

original: kha zas ro brgya zos kyang ma 'grangs pa //
analyzed: kha zas ro brgya zos kyang ma 'grangs pa //
translated: May eat a hundred different kinds of food but not be satisfied,

original: de la bkres med zas med sems can med //
analyzed: de la bkres med zas med sems can med //
translated: In that there is no hunger, no food, and no sentient being,

original: rmi lam de 'drar chos rnams thams cad gzigs //
analyzed: rmi lam de 'drar chos rnams thams cad gzigs //
translated: So you have seen that all phenomena are like a dream.

original: skom pa'i mi zhig nyal ba'i rmi lam na //
analyzed: skom pa'i mi zhig nyal ba'i rmi lam na //
translated: A thirsty person who is lying down in a dream

original: chu bsil dang zhing rnyog med 'thungs gyur kyang //
analyzed: chu bsil dang zhing rnyog med 'thungs gyur kyang //
translated: May drink cool, clear, unclouded water,

original: ngoms med tsha ba zhi bar mi 'gyur te //
analyzed: ngoms med tsha ba zhi bar mi 'gyur te //
translated: And the heat of unsatiation will not be pacified.

original: de bzhin khyod kyis chos rnams thams cad gzigs //
analyzed: de bzhin khyod kyis chos rnams thams cad gzigs //
translated: In the same way, you see all phenomena.

original: 'di la byed med tshor med sems can med //
analyzed: 'di la byed med tshor med sems can med //
translated: Here there is no agent, no feeling, no sentient being,

original: byas pa de bzhin med cing rnam smin med //
analyzed: byas pa de bzhin med cing rnam smin med //
translated: No action, no nonexistence, no ripening,

original: 'bras bu myong bar 'gyur pa de med ces //
analyzed: 'bras bu myong bar 'gyur pa de med ces //
translated: And no experience of the result.

original: 'di 'dra'i chos mkhyen the tshom yong mi mnga'//
analyzed: 'di 'dra'i chos mkhyen the tshom yong mi mnga'//
translated: Knowing phenomena in this way, you have no doubts.

original: mi zhig yid du 'ong ba'i tshig smra na //
analyzed: mi zhig yid du 'ong ba'i tshig smra na //
translated: When someone speaks pleasant words,

original: dga' bar 'gyur yang tshig la 'pho ba med //
analyzed: dga' bar 'gyur yang tshig la 'pho ba med //
translated: One becomes happy, but the words do not transfer.

original: tshig nyid med cing dgar 'gyur dngos med kyang //
analyzed: tshig nyid med cing dgar 'gyur dngos med kyang //
translated: The words themselves do not exist, and the happiness is not a real thing.

original: de mkhyen de la the tshom yong mi mnga'//
analyzed: de mkhyen de la the tshom yong mi mnga'//
translated: Knowing this, you have no doubts about it.

original: @202a *// pi wang sgra snyan mnyan na rnar snyan te //
analyzed: @202a *// pi wang sgra snyan mnyan na rnar snyan te //
translated: When listening to the pleasant sound of a lute,

original: sgra de rang bzhin gang yang yod ma yin //
analyzed: sgra de rang bzhin gang yang yod ma yin //
translated: That sound has no intrinsic nature at all.

original: de ltar mkhas pas phung po 'di gzigs na //
analyzed: de ltar mkhas pas phung po 'di gzigs na //
translated: In the same way, when the wise see these aggregates,

original: phung po'i rang bzhin gang yang dmigs mi mnga'//
analyzed: phung po'i rang bzhin gang yang dmigs mi mnga'//
translated: They do not observe any intrinsic nature of the aggregates.

original: nor bu rin chen rang bzhin gsal dag pa //
analyzed: nor bu rin chen rang bzhin gsal dag pa //
translated: A precious jewel is naturally clear and pure.

original: gos gyi drung bzhag sna tshogs tshon du 'gyur //
analyzed: gos gyi drung bzhag sna tshogs tshon du 'gyur //
translated: And placed in the presence of a cloth, it will change into various colors.

original: de ltar rang bzhin yongs dag chos rnams kyang //
analyzed: de ltar rang bzhin yongs dag chos rnams kyang //
translated: In this way, the phenomena of complete purity of nature

original: log pa'i rnam par rtog pas de ltar 'gyur //
analyzed: log pa'i rnam par rtog pas de ltar 'gyur //
translated: Are like that due to mistaken conceptualization.

original: tsandan dri med skyon dang bral ba yang //
analyzed: tsandan dri med skyon dang bral ba yang //
translated: Even stainless sandalwood, free from faults,

original: rkyen dang sbyar na dri zhim gzhan du 'gyur //
analyzed: rkyen dang sbyar na dri zhim gzhan du 'gyur //
translated: When combined with conditions, will change into another fragrant scent.

original: de ltar rang bzhin yongs dag chos rnams kyang //
analyzed: de ltar rang bzhin yongs dag chos rnams kyang //
translated: In this way, the phenomena of complete purity of nature

original: so sor rang gis brtags pa'i rnam pa bzhin //
analyzed: so sor rang gis brtags pa'i rnam pa bzhin //
translated: Are like the aspects individually examined.

original: ji ltar mi yi dung gi sgra thos te //
analyzed: ji ltar mi yi dung gi sgra thos te //
translated: Just as the sound of a human conch is heard,

original: sgra 'di ga las byung zhes brtags byas kyang //
analyzed: sgra 'di ga las byung zhes brtags byas kyang //
translated: And when investigated, “Where does this sound come from?”

original: rang bzhin stong pa'i dngos po de mi dmigs //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa'i dngos po de mi dmigs //

analyzed: du byis pa dga' bar bgyi ba'i slad du mig yor dang / smig rgyu dang / brag ca'i bya ba dag kyang tha snyad du bgyi ste /

analyzed: de ltar bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal to //
translated: in this way we understand the meaning of what the Blessed One has said.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /

original: 'di ni / chos thams cad snang ba zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: 'di ni / chos thams cad snang ba zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: this is the meditative absorption called the Illumination of All Phenomena.

original: de skad ces gsol nas 'od gsal gyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa /
analyzed: de skad ces gsol nas 'od gsal gyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa /
translated: Having said this, the gods of Abhasvara extolled the Blessed One with these verses:

original: bde gshegs khyod kyis tshul gcig mkhyen te 'on kyang gzhan dang gzhan du gsungs //
analyzed: bde gshegs khyod kyis tshul gcig mkhyen te 'on kyang gzhan dang gzhan du gsungs //
translated: “The Sugata knows the one principle, but teaches it in various ways.

original: thub pa 'jig rten mkhas pa'i sras rnams rnam par rol pa'ang de bzhin no //
analyzed: thub pa 'jig rten mkhas pa'i sras rnams rnam par rol pa'ang de bzhin no //
translated: The heirs of the Sage, who are skilled in the world, also play in that way.

original: de la 'jig rten blo med bdag tu lta ba rnams kyis khong mi chud //
analyzed: de la 'jig rten blo med bdag tu lta ba rnams kyis khong mi chud //
translated: The world, which is ignorant and has the view of a self, does not understand this.

original: bdag gi don de phyogs bcur ma mchis bdag nyid kyis ni 'gro ba stong //🔽sgyu ma gsog dang smig rgyu chu ma mchis la chab kyi 'du shes can //
analyzed: bdag gi don de phyogs bcur ma mchis bdag nyid kyis ni 'gro ba stong // sgyu ma gsog dang smig rgyu chu ma mchis la chab kyi 'du shes can //
translated: “The self is not in the ten directions, and the self is not in the world.

original: byis pa de dag blo log de bzhin 'khrul te bdag tu sbyor ba bgyid //🔽de dag yang dag ma 'tshal mi mkhas gnas min dngos la brten kyang 'tshal //
analyzed: byis pa de dag blo log de bzhin 'khrul te bdag tu sbyor ba bgyid // de dag yang dag ma 'tshal mi mkhas gnas min dngos la brten kyang 'tshal //
translated: The foolish are deluded and think of the self as real,🔽But the self is like a mirage, a bubble, a dream, or a flash of lightning.🔽“The foolish do not know the self, and they are not skilled in the way things are.

original: de bzhin byis pa'i skye bo smig rgyu 'dra ba'i phung po yong ma 'tshal //
analyzed: de bzhin byis pa'i skye bo smig rgyu 'dra ba'i phung po yong ma 'tshal //
translated: They do not know the aggregates, which are like a mirage,

original: 'khor bar dga' bas zug rngus zug cing sdug bsngal de yis dbang po 'das //
analyzed: 'khor bar dga' bas zug rngus zug cing sdug bsngal de yis dbang po 'das //
translated: And they are pierced by the arrow of desire for saṃsāra.

original: gang la mi mkhas nges par sdug @208b bsngal myong ba de la dngos ma mchis //
analyzed: gang la mi mkhas nges par sdug @208b bsngal myong ba de la dngos ma mchis //
translated: “The foolish experience suffering, but there is no reality in suffering.

original: blo stor yid nor sdug bsngal rnams la bde bar 'du shes nor pa la //
analyzed: blo stor yid nor sdug bsngal rnams la bde bar 'du shes nor pa la //
translated: They are confused and think of suffering as happiness.

original: nyon mongs 'jigs pa che dang dug gsum rnams kyang rjes su 'gro zhing 'brang //
analyzed: nyon mongs 'jigs pa che dang dug gsum rnams kyang rjes su 'gro zhing 'brang //
translated: They are followed by the three poisons and the great fear of the kleśas.

original: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dug chen nyon mongs mtshungs med rjes su 'brang //
analyzed: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dug chen nyon mongs mtshungs med rjes su 'brang //
translated: “The great poisons of desire, anger, and ignorance, the afflictions, follow them.

original: blo stor de dag sdug bsngal gang gis sdug bsngal gyur ba'i sdug bsngal ba //
analyzed: blo stor de dag sdug bsngal gang gis sdug bsngal gyur ba'i sdug bsngal ba //
translated: The suffering that causes suffering for those who have lost their minds

original: de rnams de dag rjes 'brang byis pa mi mkhas gnod pa khur yang khyer //
analyzed: de rnams de dag rjes 'brang byis pa mi mkhas gnod pa khur yang khyer //
translated: Is carried by those childish, unskilled ones as a burden of harm.

original: de dag rgyal ba'i tshul sgo thar par bgyid pa stong pa 'di thos nas //
analyzed: de dag rgyal ba'i tshul sgo thar par bgyid pa stong pa 'di thos nas //
translated: “When they hear this emptiness that is the gateway to the way of the victors,

original: skyes bu ngan pa blo zhan de dag bstan dag bde ba nyid kyis 'jigs //
analyzed: skyes bu ngan pa blo zhan de dag bstan dag bde ba nyid kyis 'jigs //
translated: Those evil, weak-minded ones are afraid of the teachings themselves.

original: bde gshegs khyod kyis aa yi yi ge tshul chen sgo gcig de ltar bstan //
analyzed: bde gshegs khyod kyis aa yi yi ge tshul chen sgo gcig de ltar bstan //
translated: Sugata, you have taught the one gateway of the great method of the syllable A.

original: de la yang dag blo can sa las shing skye bzhin du yid bskyed cing //
analyzed: de la yang dag blo can sa las shing skye bzhin du yid bskyed cing //
translated: “Those with the right understanding, like a tree growing from the earth,

original: bdud rnams bye ba dpung dang bcas btul byang chub zhi ba mngon 'tshang rgya //
analyzed: bdud rnams bye ba dpung dang bcas btul byang chub zhi ba mngon 'tshang rgya //
translated: Will conquer the millions of māras with their armies and manifest the peace of enlightenment.

original: yan lag brgyad pa'i grur bcas skye bo nyon mongs rgya mtsho che las sgrol //
analyzed: yan lag brgyad pa'i grur bcas skye bo nyon mongs rgya mtsho che las sgrol //
translated: They will liberate beings from the great ocean of the afflictions with the boat of the eightfold path.🔽“

original: bde bar gshegs pa cang mkhyen nges pa rnams ni tshul gyi dam pa des //
analyzed: bde bar gshegs pa cang mkhyen nges pa rnams ni tshul gyi dam pa des //
translated: The Sugatas, who know all that is to be known, have declared this to be the highest morality.

original: myur du nyon mongs dug bsal byang chub dpag yas zhi ba thob 'gyur zhing //
analyzed: myur du nyon mongs dug bsal byang chub dpag yas zhi ba thob 'gyur zhing //
translated: The Sugatas, who know for certain, have quickly removed the poison of the afflictions, and have attained the infinite peace of enlightenment.

original: grol nas dug med gyur pa skye bo gzhan mthong nges pa'i mkhyen brnyes nas; ;pha rol myur phyin dug med bde zhing gdug pa thams cad 'joms par mdzad //
analyzed: grol nas dug med gyur pa skye bo gzhan mthong nges pa'i mkhyen brnyes nas; ;pha rol myur phyin dug med bde zhing gdug pa thams cad 'joms par mdzad //
translated: Having seen other beings, they have attained the knowledge of liberation and freedom from poison, and they quickly go to the other side, free from poison, blissful, and destroying all evil.

original: bde gshegs thams cad stong yang bdag tu rtog rnams tshul dang tshul min rtog /🔽'gro ba @209a *//
analyzed: bde gshegs thams cad stong yang bdag tu rtog rnams tshul dang tshul min rtog / 'gro ba @209a *//
translated: The Sugatas, though empty, are skilled in discerning what is proper and improper for those who conceive of a self.

original: kun gyi nang nas mkhas pa tshul dang tshul min bslab pa dag /
analyzed: kun gyi nang nas mkhas pa tshul dang tshul min bslab pa dag /
translated: Among all beings, they are the wise ones who have trained in what is proper and improper.

original: grol nas 'gro ba kun la chags med yid kyis ngo bo nyid kyi chos //
analyzed: grol nas 'gro ba kun la chags med yid kyis ngo bo nyid kyi chos //
translated: Having been liberated, they have a nature that is free from attachment to all beings.

original: de yi tshul mthong tshul la mkhas pa de dag mthu chen mgon por 'gyur //
analyzed: de yi tshul mthong tshul la mkhas pa de dag mthu chen mgon por 'gyur //
translated: Those who see their way and are skilled in the way become powerful protectors.

original: 'ching dang bcings pa med cing bde bar gshegs pa chos rnams chos nyid med //
analyzed: 'ching dang bcings pa med cing bde bar gshegs pa chos rnams chos nyid med //
translated: There is no bondage or one who is bound, and the Sugatas have no intrinsic nature in phenomena.

original: de bzhin nyid dang ma nor de bzhin nyid zhi mi dga' nyon mi mongs //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid dang ma nor de bzhin nyid zhi mi dga' nyon mi mongs //
translated: Suchness, unerring suchness, peace, non-delight, non-affliction,

original: nyon mongs mtshan ma med cing zhi byed med la nyon mongs rnams kyang med //
analyzed: nyon mongs mtshan ma med cing zhi byed med la nyon mongs rnams kyang med //
translated: No affliction, no sign, no pacification, and no afflictions.

original: gang gis tshul chen dam pa 'di mthong de dag thams cad mkhyen du 'gyur //
analyzed: gang gis tshul chen dam pa 'di mthong de dag thams cad mkhyen du 'gyur //
translated: Those who see this supreme, great way will become omniscient.

original: grol zhing 'grol mdzad zhi ba'i chos can zhi mdzad ngo mtshar 'gyur mi mnga'//
analyzed: grol zhing 'grol mdzad zhi ba'i chos can zhi mdzad ngo mtshar 'gyur mi mnga'//
translated: Liberated and liberating, peaceful, pacifying, wondrous, and unchanging,🔽The Blessed One, like a mirage in the spring for the world with its gods and humans,

original: bcom ldan 'das lhar bcas 'jig rten dpyid kyi smig rgyu bzhin du 'khrul ba de; ;kun rtogs bdag nyid zil gnon bdag dang gzhan med skyes pa bud med rtog /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das lhar bcas 'jig rten dpyid kyi smig rgyu bzhin du 'khrul ba de; ;kun rtogs bdag nyid zil gnon bdag dang gzhan med skyes pa bud med rtog /
translated: Subduing the nature of conceptualization, without self or other, conceiving of men and women,

original: 'gro ba sdug bsngal de na sna tshogs kyis bskyed sems kyis sems kyang ni //
analyzed: 'gro ba sdug bsngal de na sna tshogs kyis bskyed sems kyis sems kyang ni //
translated: The world is born from suffering, and the mind is also born from the mind.

original: las dang 'bras bu med cing de myong gang gyur de yang med //
analyzed: las dang 'bras bu med cing de myong gang gyur de yang med //
translated: There is no karma or result, and that which experiences it does not exist.

original: bde gshegs de ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul tshul ni bdag cag 'tshal //
analyzed: bde gshegs de ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul tshul ni bdag cag 'tshal //
translated: Thus, Sugata, we understand the way of the sphere of activity of the buddhas.

original: des na de ltar bde gshegs zhi thugs dbang po zhi zhing nges pa ste //
analyzed: des na de ltar bde gshegs zhi thugs dbang po zhi zhing nges pa ste //
translated: Therefore, the Sugata, with a peaceful mind, with peaceful senses, and with certainty,

original: dge ba'i blo mnga' dgra gtsang dri med chos kyis rab tu mchod par 'gyur //
analyzed: dge ba'i blo mnga' dgra gtsang dri med chos kyis rab tu mchod par 'gyur //
translated: with a virtuous mind, with pure enemies, is worshipped with the stainless Dharma.

original: sangs rgyas 'jig rten 'phags pa'i gtso bo bstod pas bsod nams @209b gang byung ba //
analyzed: sangs rgyas 'jig rten 'phags pa'i gtso bo bstod pas bsod nams @209b gang byung ba //
translated: Whatever merit has arisen from praising the Buddha, the foremost in the world,

original: ji snyed dpal stug rkang gnyis gtso bo rnam smin yongs su mkhyen gyur pa'i //
analyzed: ji snyed dpal stug rkang gnyis gtso bo rnam smin yongs su mkhyen gyur pa'i //
translated: to the extent that the foremost of humans, the one with deep splendor, fully knows the ripening [of karma],

original: bdag cag dge rtsa de yis 'gro ba 'di kun kun mkhyen nyid thob shog /
analyzed: bdag cag dge rtsa de yis 'gro ba 'di kun kun mkhyen nyid thob shog /
translated: by that root of virtue, may all beings attain omniscience.

original: bsod nams 'di kun 'gro ba kun gyi don bsngo kun kyang rgyal bar shog /
analyzed: bsod nams 'di kun 'gro ba kun gyi don bsngo kun kyang rgyal bar shog /
translated: May all this merit be dedicated for the sake of all beings, and may all become victorious.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od gsal gyi lha de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pa dang // tshul gyi rjes su 'gro ba'i spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa yang thugs su chud la /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od gsal gyi lha de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pa dang // tshul gyi rjes su 'gro ba'i spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa yang thugs su chud la /
translated: Then the Blessed One understood the pure superior intention of those gods of the Pure Abodes, and their perfect eloquence that accords with the way,

original: 'khor de dag gis kyang khyad par thob par 'gyur bar mkhyen nas de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do //
analyzed: 'khor de dag gis kyang khyad par thob par 'gyur bar mkhyen nas de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do //
translated: Knowing that the assembly would attain distinction, he smiled.

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa /
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa /
translated: Then the venerable Aśvajit spoke to the Blessed One in verse:

original: 'jig rten don mdzad rnam par 'dren mchog kun mkhyen thams cad zil gnon pa //
analyzed: 'jig rten don mdzad rnam par 'dren mchog kun mkhyen thams cad zil gnon pa //
translated: “The one who benefits the world, the supreme guide, the omniscient one who overwhelms all,

original: bde gshegs thugs rje ldan rnams rgyu ma mchis par bzhad pa mi mdzad na //
analyzed: bde gshegs thugs rje ldan rnams rgyu ma mchis par bzhad pa mi mdzad na //
translated: The blissful one endowed with compassion, the one who does not smile without a reason,

original: rgyal ba dpal stug rkang gnyis mchog gis 'jig rten thugs brtses bka' stsal gsol //
analyzed: rgyal ba dpal stug rkang gnyis mchog gis 'jig rten thugs brtses bka' stsal gsol //
translated: The Victor, the one with abundant glory, the supreme of two-legged beings, please speak with compassion for the world.

original: 'jig rten 'das khyod ci slad 'dzum mdzad de rgyu bdag cag rnams la gsungs //
analyzed: 'jig rten 'das khyod ci slad 'dzum mdzad de rgyu bdag cag rnams la gsungs //
translated: Transcendent one, why do you smile? Please tell us the reason.

original: gtso bo de thos 'gro ba 'di dag yid ni rab tu dang 'gyur zhing //
analyzed: gtso bo de thos 'gro ba 'di dag yid ni rab tu dang 'gyur zhing //
translated: Hearing that, O chief one, the minds of beings will be greatly delighted,

original: rnam par 'dren pa nges 'byung las dang 'bras bu gzhan yang bgyid par 'gyur //
analyzed: rnam par 'dren pa nges 'byung las dang 'bras bu gzhan yang bgyid par 'gyur //
translated: And the guide will engage in other actions for the sake of liberation.”

original: des ni lha mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'khor bar sdug bsngal nyam thag 'di //
analyzed: des ni lha mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'khor bar sdug bsngal nyam thag 'di //
translated: By this, the world of gods and men, afflicted with the misery of transmigration,

original: 'phags lam yan lag brgyad bstan srid pa'i rgya mtsho 'di las sgrol @210a *//
analyzed: 'phags lam yan lag brgyad bstan srid pa'i rgya mtsho 'di las sgrol @210a *//
translated: Will be delivered from the ocean of existence, by the teaching of the eightfold path of the Saints.

original: bar 'gyur // drang srong chen po'i gsung mchog yan lag brgyad ldan bzang po 'di thos nas /
analyzed: bar 'gyur // drang srong chen po'i gsung mchog yan lag brgyad ldan bzang po 'di thos nas /
translated: Having heard this excellent and salutary doctrine of the great Rishi, which consists of eight branches,

original: 'gro ba thams cad sangs rgyas nyid 'tshal dge la brtson zhing dga' bar 'gyur //
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad sangs rgyas nyid 'tshal dge la brtson zhing dga' bar 'gyur //
translated: All creatures will desire to become Buddhas, and, rejoicing in virtue, will strive after it.

original: the tshom bral gyur rnam dag yid kyis brtson 'grus drag po'i stobs bskyed cing //
analyzed: the tshom bral gyur rnam dag yid kyis brtson 'grus drag po'i stobs bskyed cing //
translated: Free from doubt, with pure hearts, they will exert the strength of their vigor;

original: bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa bzhin bgyid khyod dang mthun 'byung sras su 'gyur //
analyzed: bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa bzhin bgyid khyod dang mthun 'byung sras su 'gyur //
translated: They will follow the teaching of the Sugata, and will become your sons, born of the Law.

original: 'khor rnams 'di dag rten pa gzhan ma mchis par khyod kyi zhal du lta //
analyzed: 'khor rnams 'di dag rten pa gzhan ma mchis par khyod kyi zhal du lta //
translated: These disciples will have no other refuge: they will look up to you alone.

original: 'gro ba'i rtsa lag rtog pa yid gnyis bsal zhing lung bstan bka' stsal gsol; ;bcom ldan 'jig rten 'di dag khyod kyi zham ring gnas shing nyan par 'tshal //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i rtsa lag rtog pa yid gnyis bsal zhing lung bstan bka' stsal gsol; ;bcom ldan 'jig rten 'di dag khyod kyi zham ring gnas shing nyan par 'tshal //
translated: “You are the kinsman of beings, the dispeller of doubt. Please give a prophecy. Bhagavān, this world is waiting for your words.

original: gsung rab legs brjod bdud rtsi'i char phob gang dag skom pa 'tshal bar 'gyur; ;'dren pa chen po khyod kyi 'khor 'di dag cing sangs rgyas yon tan 'tshal //
analyzed: gsung rab legs brjod bdud rtsi'i char phob gang dag skom pa 'tshal bar 'gyur; ;'dren pa chen po khyod kyi 'khor 'di dag cing sangs rgyas yon tan 'tshal //
translated: “Please rain down the nectar of the excellent speech of the Sugata. Those who are thirsty will drink. Great Guide, this assembly of yours is pure and wishes for the qualities of buddhahood.

original: ring du song ba'i ma la bu lta bzhin du khyod kyi zhal du lta //
analyzed: ring du song ba'i ma la bu lta bzhin du khyod kyi zhal du lta //
translated: “They look to you, O Guide, like a child to its mother.

original: bde gshegs lha rnams lung bstan bka' stsal bzhad pa'i don kyang bstan du gsol //
analyzed: bde gshegs lha rnams lung bstan bka' stsal bzhad pa'i don kyang bstan du gsol //
translated: Sugata, please give a prophecy to the devas and explain the meaning of your smile.

original: skyob pa'i gsung mchog thos na 'jig rten don chen shin tu thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: skyob pa'i gsung mchog thos na 'jig rten don chen shin tu thob par 'gyur //
translated: “When they hear the supreme words of the Protector, the world will attain great benefit.

original: thub pa de ring su zhig dge ba 'phel cing grags pa don du gnyer //
analyzed: thub pa de ring su zhig dge ba 'phel cing grags pa don du gnyer //
translated: Sage, who today will increase in merit and fame?

original: su zhig 'dren pa'i yon tan gter rnyed 'gyur pa bdag cag de nyan 'tshal //
analyzed: su zhig 'dren pa'i yon tan gter rnyed 'gyur pa bdag cag de nyan 'tshal //
translated: Who will find the treasure of the qualities of the Guide? We are waiting to hear.”

original: rgyal ba'i 'khor rnams khyod kyis gsungs pa de dag thos @210b shing dag gyur nas //
analyzed: rgyal ba'i 'khor rnams khyod kyis gsungs pa de dag thos @210b shing dag gyur nas //
translated: The retinue of the Victorious One, having heard and purified your teachings,

original: tshul 'di ston cing ting 'dzin stobs ldan shes rab la yang sgom par 'gyur //
analyzed: tshul 'di ston cing ting 'dzin stobs ldan shes rab la yang sgom par 'gyur //
translated: Will demonstrate this method and cultivate wisdom and the power of samadhi.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa /
translated: Then the Blessed One spoke these verses in reply to the venerable Aśvajit:

original: rta thul khyod kyi spobs pa legs par dus ldan skyes pa shin tu legs //
analyzed: rta thul khyod kyi spobs pa legs par dus ldan skyes pa shin tu legs //
translated: Aśvajit, your eloquence is excellent, timely, and very good.

original: bde gshegs rnam par sprul bzhin de ltar khyod kyi blo gros 'byung 'gyur zhing //
analyzed: bde gshegs rnam par sprul bzhin de ltar khyod kyi blo gros 'byung 'gyur zhing //
translated: Your mind will arise like the emanations of the Sugata,

original: spobs ba che 'byung de phyir gang dang gang dag khyod kyis dris gyur pa //
analyzed: spobs ba che 'byung de phyir gang dang gang dag khyod kyis dris gyur pa //
translated: And since great eloquence will arise, whatever you ask

original: de dag lung bstan ngas bshad kun kyang dbang po zhi bas mnyan par gyis //
analyzed: de dag lung bstan ngas bshad kun kyang dbang po zhi bas mnyan par gyis //
translated: I will explain and expound upon, so listen with a peaceful mind.

original: 'od gsal ba yi lha rnams blo dag sngon gyi rgyal ba mthong ba ste //
analyzed: 'od gsal ba yi lha rnams blo dag sngon gyi rgyal ba mthong ba ste //
translated: The clear light gods have pure minds and have seen the Victorious Ones of the past.

original: 'jig rten mgon med yid can dag mthong byang chub yang dag zhugs //
analyzed: 'jig rten mgon med yid can dag mthong byang chub yang dag zhugs //
translated: Seeing the world without a protector, they enter into perfect enlightenment.

original: byang chub nges 'byung lam mchog yang dag rgyal bas spyad pa spyod //
analyzed: byang chub nges 'byung lam mchog yang dag rgyal bas spyad pa spyod //
translated: The Victorious One has practiced the perfect path of definite emergence for enlightenment.

original: byang chub 'gro 'dod gang tshe ston med lam stor rnams la ston par 'gyur //
analyzed: byang chub 'gro 'dod gang tshe ston med lam stor rnams la ston par 'gyur //
translated: When they wish to go to enlightenment, they will be teachers for those who have lost the path.

original: tshul gyi dam pa shin tu gsal sgra thun mong ma yin 'di thos nas //
analyzed: tshul gyi dam pa shin tu gsal sgra thun mong ma yin 'di thos nas //
translated: Having heard this unique, very clear, and perfect sound,

original: sangs rgyas yon tan don gnyer blo sbyangs de dag byang chub zhi thob 'gyur //
analyzed: sangs rgyas yon tan don gnyer blo sbyangs de dag byang chub zhi thob 'gyur //
translated: Those who have trained their minds in striving for the qualities of the Buddha will attain the peace of enlightenment.

original: de dag stobs skyes tshul dang tshul min mkhas shing byang chub yid nges gyur //
analyzed: de dag stobs skyes tshul dang tshul min mkhas shing byang chub yid nges gyur //
translated: Skilled in the way and the way of non-action, they will be born with the power of certainty in enlightenment.

original: bu skyes ma bzhin dga' bas byang chub mchog tu de dag smon lam btab //
analyzed: bu skyes ma bzhin dga' bas byang chub mchog tu de dag smon lam btab //
translated: Like a mother with a newborn child, they will rejoice and make aspirations for supreme enlightenment.

original: 'od gsal lha rnams 'di dag byang chub 'dod la tshul gyi sgo bstan te //
analyzed: 'od gsal lha rnams 'di dag byang chub 'dod la tshul gyi sgo bstan te //
translated: The gods of the Abhasvara realm will teach the door of the way to those who desire enlightenment.

original: bskal pa khrag khrig brjod du med par phra ba'i tshul 'di bstan byas nas //🔽sems can skar @211a *//
analyzed: bskal pa khrag khrig brjod du med par phra ba'i tshul 'di bstan byas nas // sems can skar @211a *//
translated: Having taught this subtle way for inexpressibly many millions of eons,

original: ma'i grangs pas ches mang ba dag byang chub dga' byas te //
analyzed: ma'i grangs pas ches mang ba dag byang chub dga' byas te //
translated: They will delight many beings, more numerous than the stars, in enlightenment.

original: de yi 'og tu 'jig rten mkhas pa rang byung skyon bral kun mkhyen 'gyur //
analyzed: de yi 'og tu 'jig rten mkhas pa rang byung skyon bral kun mkhyen 'gyur //
translated: “After that, the self-arisen, faultless, omniscient, wise one of the world

original: de dag zhing mchog brjod du med pa zhing rnams bye ba brgya bgrangs par //
analyzed: de dag zhing mchog brjod du med pa zhing rnams bye ba brgya bgrangs par //
translated: In the hundreds of thousands of millions of unexcelled, supreme buddhafields,

original: yangs shing shin tu dga' la mtha' dag bkod pa rnams kyis brgyan pa ste //
analyzed: yangs shing shin tu dga' la mtha' dag bkod pa rnams kyis brgyan pa ste //
translated: Which are vast, delightful, and completely adorned with arrays,

original: kun gyi zhing du ngan song rnams dang de bzhin mi khom yong mi 'byung //
analyzed: kun gyi zhing du ngan song rnams dang de bzhin mi khom yong mi 'byung //
translated: In all of those buddhafields, the lower realms and the unfavorable states do not exist.

original: bde bar gshegs rnams thugs brtses sems can thams cad rang byung mdzad par 'gyur //
analyzed: bde bar gshegs rnams thugs brtses sems can thams cad rang byung mdzad par 'gyur //
translated: The sugatas, with compassion, will make all beings self-arisen.

original: zhing rnams de dag gang na'ang nyan thos theg pa ston par mi 'gyur te //
analyzed: zhing rnams de dag gang na'ang nyan thos theg pa ston par mi 'gyur te //
translated: In those buddhafields, the vehicle of the śrāvakas will not be taught;

original: sems can thams cad rang byung nyid du mngon phyogs 'phrog pa med par 'gyur //
analyzed: sems can thams cad rang byung nyid du mngon phyogs 'phrog pa med par 'gyur //
translated: All beings will be inclined toward self-arising and will not be carried away.🔽In those buddhafields, the wise ones, the self-arisen buddhas, will teach

original: de na rang byung sangs rgyas nyid ston mdzad pa 'jig rten mkhas rnams kyi; ;sku tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa bye ba brgya grangs gangg'a'i bye snyed 'gyur //
analyzed: de na rang byung sangs rgyas nyid ston mdzad pa 'jig rten mkhas rnams kyi; ;sku tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa bye ba brgya grangs gangg'a'i bye snyed 'gyur //
translated: For as long as the lifespan of a hundred million eons, as numerous as the sands of the Ganges River.”

original: rta thul 'jig rten khrag khrig khams kyi nyan thos mya ngan bzlas pa bas //
analyzed: rta thul 'jig rten khrag khrig khams kyi nyan thos mya ngan bzlas pa bas //
translated: “The world’s billions of hearers, who have conquered the horse of the mind, have not eliminated suffering.🔽

original: gang yang skyes pa'am bud med gcig cig byang chub yang dag dga' byas na //
analyzed: gang yang skyes pa'am bud med gcig cig byang chub yang dag dga' byas na //
translated: The merit of a single man or woman who delights in enlightenment is greater than that of all the world’s hearers who have overcome suffering.

original: bsod nams de la snga mas grangs sam dper yang bya bar mi nus so //
analyzed: bsod nams de la snga mas grangs sam dper yang bya bar mi nus so //
translated: The merit of the former cannot be calculated or compared to the latter.

original: de bas byang chub zhugs pa'i skyes bu dam pa byang chub dga' bar gyis //
analyzed: de bas byang chub zhugs pa'i skyes bu dam pa byang chub dga' bar gyis //
translated: Therefore, delight in enlightenment, O best of beings who have entered the path to enlightenment.

original: rta thul 'di la 'dren pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'byung ba rnyed sla min //
analyzed: rta thul 'di la 'dren pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'byung ba rnyed sla min //
translated: “It is not easy to find the appearance of a leader who is omniscient, O Horse-Tamers.

original: de ni au dum wa ra'i me tog 'dra zhes sangs rgyas mtha' yas blo mnga' gsungs //
analyzed: de ni au dum wa ra'i me tog 'dra zhes sangs rgyas mtha' yas blo mnga' gsungs //
translated: The Buddha, whose mind is infinite, has said that he is as rare as the udumbara flower.

original: de phyir bla @211b na med pa'i zhi bde byang chub mi gang 'dod pa yis //
analyzed: de phyir bla @211b na med pa'i zhi bde byang chub mi gang 'dod pa yis //
translated: Therefore, those who desire the highest peace, the bliss of enlightenment,

original: shin tu blo phra bsten bzang mkhyen pa tshul mkhas 'dren la brten par bya //
analyzed: shin tu blo phra bsten bzang mkhyen pa tshul mkhas 'dren la brten par bya //
translated: should rely on a leader who is very wise, who is skilled in the ways of knowledge and good conduct.

original: de bzhin gshegs kyi zhal nas don byed gsungs dge de 'dra thos gyur nas //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs kyi zhal nas don byed gsungs dge de 'dra thos gyur nas //
translated: “Having heard the words of the Tathagata, which are meaningful and virtuous,

original: 'khor rnams thams cad yi rang mchog tu dga' zhing yang dag dga' bar gyur //
analyzed: 'khor rnams thams cad yi rang mchog tu dga' zhing yang dag dga' bar gyur //
translated: The entire retinue was delighted, supremely joyful, and overjoyed.

original: khrag khrig lha rnams nam mkhar 'khod nas gos kyi g-yab mo 'dor bar byed //
analyzed: khrag khrig lha rnams nam mkhar 'khod nas gos kyi g-yab mo 'dor bar byed //
translated: Trillions of gods, standing in the sky, waved their garments.

original: dga' nas sangs rgyas dbang phyug khyod la phyag 'tshal lo zhes sgra yang phyung //
analyzed: dga' nas sangs rgyas dbang phyug khyod la phyag 'tshal lo zhes sgra yang phyung //
translated: They cried out in joy, “Homage to you, O Lord Buddha!”

original: zhi ba thugs zhi skye bo nyon mongs rgod pas rgod gyur zhi bar mdzod //
analyzed: zhi ba thugs zhi skye bo nyon mongs rgod pas rgod gyur zhi bar mdzod //
translated: “You are peaceful, your mind is peaceful; pacify the agitated beings who are agitated by the afflictions.

original: bdud rtsi ston cing dug gsum zhi mdzad sems can dug ni skyug tu gsol //
analyzed: bdud rtsi ston cing dug gsum zhi mdzad sems can dug ni skyug tu gsol //
translated: Show the nectar, pacify the three poisons, and make beings vomit up the poison.🔽Having heard your wisdom, beings will be free from poison and free from enemies.

original: khyod kyi ye shes thos nas skye rgu'i dug med 'gyur zhing dgra med 'gyur //
analyzed: khyod kyi ye shes thos nas skye rgu'i dug med 'gyur zhing dgra med 'gyur //
translated: Having heard the way to be a guide for those who suffer, they will be liberated from the endless stream of existence.”🔽This concludes the chapter on the prediction of the light, the twenty-first chapter of the Dharma teaching of “The White Lotus of the Good Dharma.”🔽Chapter🔽 Translation: The entire retinue was delighted, supremely joyful, and overjoyed.🔽Trillions of gods, standing in the sky, waved their garments.🔽They cried out in joy, “Homage to you, O Lord Buddha!”🔽“You are peaceful, your mind is peaceful; pacify the agitated beings who are agitated by the afflictions.🔽Show the nectar, pacify the three poisons, and make beings vomit up the poison.🔽Having heard your wisdom, beings will be free from poison and free from enemies.

original: sdug bsngal rnams kyi 'dren las tshul thos mi zad srid pa'i rgyud las 'grol //🔽'od gsal ba lung bstan pa'i le'u ste /
analyzed: sdug bsngal rnams kyi 'dren las tshul thos mi zad srid pa'i rgyud las 'grol // 'od gsal ba lung bstan pa'i le'u ste /
translated: Having heard the way to be a guide for those who suffer, they will be liberated from the endless stream of existence.”

original: nyi shu gcig pa'o ////
analyzed: nyi shu gcig pa'o ////
translated: This concludes the chapter on the prediction of the light, the twenty-first chapter of the Dharma teaching of “The White Lotus of the Good Dharma.”

original: bam po brgyad pa /
analyzed: bam po brgyad pa /
translated: Chapter

original: de nas dge rgyas kyi ris kyi lha khrag khrig phrag bcu gnyis kyis lha ma yin rnams nas 'od gsal ba'i lha'i bar dag gi mchod pa yang mthong /
analyzed: de nas dge rgyas kyi ris kyi lha khrag khrig phrag bcu gnyis kyis lha ma yin rnams nas 'od gsal ba'i lha'i bar dag gi mchod pa yang mthong /
translated: Then, the gods of the Śubhakṛtsna realm, twelve trillion in number, saw the offerings of the asuras and the gods of the Abhasvara realm.

original: lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te /
analyzed: lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te /
translated: Having heard the prophecy, they were satisfied, delighted, and overjoyed.

original: rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang // yid bde ba skyes nas bdag cag tshul phun sum tshogs par gyur pa yang brjod cing /
analyzed: rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang // yid bde ba skyes nas bdag cag tshul phun sum tshogs par gyur pa yang brjod cing /
translated: They were filled with joy and bliss, and they praised their own perfect conduct.

original: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: They said to the Blessed One,

original: bcom @212a *// ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom @212a *// ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: chos thams cad la bde bar 'gro ba zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin mchis te /
analyzed: chos thams cad la bde bar 'gro ba zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin mchis te /
translated: there is a samādhi called ‘going to bliss in all phenomena.’

original: ting nge 'dzin de thob pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dmigs pa'i dngos po thams cad la bde ba'i tshor ba sha stag myong bar 'gyur zhing sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba mi myong la /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin de thob pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dmigs pa'i dngos po thams cad la bde ba'i tshor ba sha stag myong bar 'gyur zhing sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba mi myong la /
translated: By attaining that samādhi, bodhisattva mahāsattvas experience only blissful sensations in relation to all perceived things, and do not experience painful sensations.

original: sdug bsngal ba yang ma lags /
analyzed: sdug bsngal ba yang ma lags /
translated: They are neither painful

original: bde ba yang ma lags pa yang mi myong ste /
analyzed: bde ba yang ma lags pa yang mi myong ste /
translated: They do not experience pleasure or pain.

original: sems can dmyal ba'i gnod pas gnod par bgyis kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas pa dang / mi'i gnod pas gnod par bgyis kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas pa dang / lag pa bcad dam /🔽rkang pa bcad dam /
analyzed: sems can dmyal ba'i gnod pas gnod par bgyis kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas pa dang / mi'i gnod pas gnod par bgyis kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas pa dang / lag pa bcad dam / rkang pa bcad dam /
translated: Even when harmed by the harm of the hells, the perception of pleasure remains present. Even when harmed by the harm of humans, the perception of pleasure remains present. Even when their hands are cut off,

original: rkang lag bcad dam /
analyzed: rkang lag bcad dam /
translated: or their feet are cut off,🔽or their hands and feet are cut off,🔽or their ears,

original: rna ba'am / sna'am /
analyzed: rna ba'am / sna'am /
translated: nose,

original: rna ba dang / sna gtubs kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur ba dang / sba lcag gis bzhus sam /
analyzed: rna ba dang / sna gtubs kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur ba dang / sba lcag gis bzhus sam /
translated: or ears and nose are cut off, the perception of pleasure remains present. Even when beaten with whips,

original: spa lcag phyed tshal lam /
analyzed: spa lcag phyed tshal lam /
translated: half-whips,

original: lcag gis bzhus kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur ba dang / btson rar bcug gam /
analyzed: lcag gis bzhus kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur ba dang / btson rar bcug gam /
translated: or lashes, the perception of pleasure remains present. Even when imprisoned,🔽fettered with iron chains,

original: lcags sgrog dang / shing sgrog tu bcug gam /🔽btson chad ma po la rgyas btab bam /
analyzed: lcags sgrog dang / shing sgrog tu bcug gam / btson chad ma po la rgyas btab bam /
translated: or fettered with wooden chains,

original: byis pa'i gtsug phud ltar bcings sam /
analyzed: byis pa'i gtsug phud ltar bcings sam /
translated: bound like a child’s topknot,

original: dugs kyi snod ltar gdugs sam /
analyzed: dugs kyi snod ltar gdugs sam /
translated: covered like a sauna,🔽beaten like sugarcane,

original: bu ram shing brdung ba ltar brdungs sam /
analyzed: bu ram shing brdung ba ltar brdungs sam /
translated: He is like a sugar cane stalk being pressed.🔽

original: 'dam bu bcom pa ltar bcom mam /
analyzed: 'dam bu bcom pa ltar bcom mam /
translated: or crushed like a reed,

original: 'bru mar gyi mar me ltar 'bar bar byas sam /
analyzed: 'bru mar gyi mar me ltar 'bar bar byas sam /
translated: or burned like a lamp of sesame oil,🔽or burned like a lamp of butter or boiling milk, still the perception of pleasure will persist.

original: mar @212b gyi mar me dang / zho bskol ba ltar 'bar bar byas kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur ba dang / me'i nang du bor ram /🔽sengge'i khar bstabs sam /
analyzed: mar @212b gyi mar me dang / zho bskol ba ltar 'bar bar byas kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur ba dang / me'i nang du bor ram / sengge'i khar bstabs sam /
translated: or thrown into a fire,🔽or thrown into the mouth of a lion,

original: stag gi khar bstabs sam /
analyzed: stag gi khar bstabs sam /
translated: or thrown into the mouth of a tiger,

original: skam ril bya ba ltar dril tam /
analyzed: skam ril bya ba ltar dril tam /
translated: or rolled up like a dried palm leaf,

original: byi ba'i chad pa lta bus bcad dam /
analyzed: byi ba'i chad pa lta bus bcad dam /
translated: or cut up like a piece of meat,

original: nyes pa byung ba bsgrags pa ltar bsgrags sam /🔽karsha pa ni tsam du gtubs sam /
analyzed: nyes pa byung ba bsgrags pa ltar bsgrags sam / karsha pa ni tsam du gtubs sam /
translated: or proclaimed like an announcement of a crime,🔽or chopped up like a kārṣāpaṇa coin,

original: 'bras phye btso ba ltar btsos sam /
analyzed: 'bras phye btso ba ltar btsos sam /
translated: or cooked like rice gruel,🔽or crushed by elephants, still the perception of pleasure will persist.

original: glang po che rnams kyis bcom yang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur ba dang / mig phyung ngam /
analyzed: glang po che rnams kyis bcom yang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur ba dang / mig phyung ngam /
translated: or their eyes gouged out,

original: gsal shing gi rtse mo la bzhag gam /
analyzed: gsal shing gi rtse mo la bzhag gam /
translated: or impaled on a stake,

original: bsad pa'i gnas su khrid de rnam pa thams cad du mgo gcod kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur te /
analyzed: bsad pa'i gnas su khrid de rnam pa thams cad du mgo gcod kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur te /
translated: or led to the place of execution and beheaded, still the perception of pleasure will persist.

original: bde ba yang ma lags mi bde ba yang ma lags pa'i 'du shes rnam pa thams cad du mi 'byung ngo //
analyzed: bde ba yang ma lags mi bde ba yang ma lags pa'i 'du shes rnam pa thams cad du mi 'byung ngo //
translated: He does not have any perception of pleasure or of neither pleasure nor pain.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des yun ring po nas spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe smon lam 'di ltar btab ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des yun ring po nas spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe smon lam 'di ltar btab ste /
translated: It is because that bodhisattva great being, when practicing the practice of the bodhisattva for a long time, made this aspiration:

original: gang gis bdag la kha zas byin pa de dag nye bar zhi ba'i bde ba thob par gyur cig /
analyzed: gang gis bdag la kha zas byin pa de dag nye bar zhi ba'i bde ba thob par gyur cig /
translated: ‘May those who give me food obtain the happiness of peace.

original: gang gis bdag la sgom blud pa de dag dang / gang gis bdag la rim gro byas pa dang / bkur stir byas pa dang / bsti stang du byas pa dang / mchod pa byas pa de dag thams cad kyang nye bar zhi ba'i bde ba thob par gyur cig /🔽gang yang bdag la gshe ba dang / mi bde bar @213a *//
analyzed: gang gis bdag la sgom blud pa de dag dang / gang gis bdag la rim gro byas pa dang / bkur stir byas pa dang / bsti stang du byas pa dang / mchod pa byas pa de dag thams cad kyang nye bar zhi ba'i bde ba thob par gyur cig /🔽gang yang bdag la gshe ba dang / mi bde bar @213a *//
translated: May those who give me drink, those who serve me, those who honor me, those who respect me, and those who worship me all obtain the happiness of peace.🔽May those who revile me, who are angry with me, who beat me, who cut me, who stab me, who burn me, who bind me, and who throw me off cliffs obtain the happiness of peace.’

original: byed pa dang / brdeg pa dang / mtshon gyis 'debs pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du srog gcod pa'i bar du byed pa de dag thams cad kyang byang chub kyi bde ba thob cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig /
analyzed: byed pa dang / brdeg pa dang / mtshon gyis 'debs pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du srog gcod pa'i bar du byed pa de dag thams cad kyang byang chub kyi bde ba thob cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig /
translated: May all those who are being killed, beaten, cut, and stabbed, and all those who are being executed, attain the happiness of awakening and fully awaken to unsurpassed and perfect buddhahood.”

original: ces smon lam btab ste /
analyzed: ces smon lam btab ste /
translated: He made this aspiration:

analyzed: mi mchog khyod kyis 'du shes rnam par bshag cing stong par rnam bzhag la //

analyzed: rgyal ba sangs rgyas dgongs pa 'di ni 'gro ba kun gyis rtogs par dka'//

analyzed: byams pa dge sgom sems can dmigs pa yin zhes 'dren pas bka' stsal la //

analyzed: sems can rnam par bshig cing 'gro ba thams cad sems can med par mkhyen //

analyzed: de ltar rkang gnyis dam pa rnyog pa mi mnga' the tshom bral thugs ldan //

analyzed: des na bde gshegs pa rnam brtags blo mnga' mchod 'os khyod la mchod par 'tshal //

analyzed: bde bar gshegs pa sdug bsngal phyogs bcur gnas pa kun tu mi dmigs kyang //

analyzed: lha yi lhar gyur khyod kyis sems can rnams la snying rje bgyi bar gsungs //

analyzed: de ltar rgyal mchog bdag cag rgyal ba'i dgongs pa ji bzhin kun tu 'tshal //

analyzed: thub pa khyod kyis sems can dang ni bsal bgyi sdug bsngal mi gzigs la //

analyzed: des na mi mchog khyod la mchod nas brnyes pa'i 'bras bu thob par bgyi //

analyzed: skyon bral khyod kyis 'gro ba kun tu sdug bsngal mya ngan 'das ma dmigs //

analyzed: 'on kyang 'khor bar sems can gzigs shing don mdzad stobs dang ldan pa bskyed //

analyzed: sems can sdug bsngal 'gro dang thub dang mya ngan 'das dang gnas ma mchis //

analyzed: sangs rgyas tshul 'di rtogs nas thub pa mchod 'od khyod la mchod par 'tshal //

analyzed: gang zhig der rdul ma gzigs gang yang tshad med gnas pa de ma gzigs //

analyzed: thub pas bag med gang yang ma gzigs bag yod mi yang ma gzigs te //

analyzed: thub pa sku ni rnam par spangs pas sku btsal mdzad na ma brnyes kyang //

analyzed: de ltar 'dren pa dran pa ma gsung ma lags bsnyel ba yong mi mnga'//

analyzed: bde bar gshegs pas lus la song ba'i sgom pa sgom par gyis zhes gsungs //

analyzed: gyur la; ;tshor ba tshor bar bgyid pa'ang thub pas yongs su btsal na ma brnyes te //

analyzed: de ltar gang zhig dran sgom de ni sangs rgyas kyis kyang yong ma gzigs //
translated: The Buddha did not see the one who remembers or the meditation.

analyzed: sangs rgyas tshul 'di 'tshal nas ston pa la ni bdag cag mchod pa bgyis //

analyzed: thub pas sems dang sems las byung ba dgongs te btsal na ma rnyed la //
translated: The Muni searched for the mind and mental factors, but did not find them.

analyzed: sangs rgyas tshul bzhi po 'di rab tu 'tshal nas skyob la mchod pa bgyis //

analyzed: ston pa'i tshul 'di 'tshal nas des na bdag cag khyod la mchod pa 'tshal //

analyzed: 'di la lha 'khor the tshom ma mchis de slad khyod la mchod pa 'tshal // sangs rgyas rnams kyi mya @216a *//
